header.topics: Communications with strangers, travel plans & arrangements, ‘the rat race’ & employment ambitions, happiness.
header.activity: Two friends talking about various topics (see 9 above) over coffee, in an hotel in Rzeszow, Poland.

speaker.occupation: unemployed/ Some part-time private TEFL teacher/ Semi-retired
Teacher of English as a foreign Language
